channel.title: CVE Feed for evarisk -- Digirisk
channel.description: The latest CVEs for evarisk -- Digirisk

item.title: CVE-2023-5946|2024-08-02T08:14:25.145Z -- evarisk -- digirisk
item.description: The Digirisk plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the 'current_group_id' parameter in version 6.0.0.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
